Whatsapp：96077992 葉小姐

Job contents:
-Responsible for the daily operation of the store and keeping the store and goods clean and tidy
-Understanding customer needs and promoting appropriate products to customers
-Performing field work and other assigned duties
Job requirements:
-Work no less than 4 days per week and 9 hours per day
- Applicants who can work part-time on a long-term basis/can start immediately will be given priority
